title: Venus Transit in the 4th House: Comfort with Stability
summary: When Venus transits the 4th house for a Capricorn Ascendant, focus turns toward emotional comfort, home life, and inner security. This period supports harmony within the family, beautification of living spaces, and a calmer emotional foundation. Relationships with mother figures or caregivers soften, and a desire for peace at home increases. Venus here encourages balancing ambition with rest, reminding you that lasting success requires emotional nourishment, not only external achievement.

sections.title: Career
points: Stable support from family aids focus

sections.title: Finance
points: Spending on home comfort or property
Financial stability brings peace of mind

closing: Venus in the 4th house reminds you that true strength grows from a peaceful inner foundation and a supportive home.
